name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (Trys10Studios)
description:
I made this game for my son whom Trys10Studios is named for and it is to be eye tracker accessible using Tobii's EyeX/4C eye tracker controller.  It is NOT currently eye tracker accessible but will be once I have another eye tracker with which to develop.  

This has a 2 player mode, or you can challenge the computer.  I was trying something different with this game (from a programming stand point) but as a user you won't notice any differences.

Hope you enjoy!
